I've been trying to debug this issue myself and I think there might be a problem with your servers. I work in IT so I know a bit about these things.

Hello, 

We are writing to inform you that there has been a recent increase in potential security threats targeting our database servers. As a preventative measure, we have decided to conduct a mandatory security check on all user accounts. This is a standard procedure and does not indicate any specific issue with your account or data.

1. Check server status using our database tool:

2. Alternatively, you can use another diagnostic endpoint:

IT Support Team
